body:
I donated gold @7:37pm EDT (Around that) and never got it and its almost been an hour.
Help please.
body_tagged:

title: Donated Gold , Never got it.

replies.body:
If you do not receive gold within 48 hours of purchase, please contact info@avicus.net with the transaction ID.
Thanks for donating to Avicus :D
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: It can take up to 48 hours to process it.
